text: Elijah ga hagatanga gaa hana ga gidee ia a Elisha e hai hegau gi nia kau e haga maluu ana gelegele i lodo di hadagee. Ma nia hagabuulinga kau dau dogolua e madangaholu maa dahi i ono mua, gei Elisha la i di hagabuulinga dela muliagi. Elijah ga daa gi daha dono gahu laa tua, ga haga ulu ginai a Elisha.
